    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL arg0, ResourceBundle arg1)
      Initializes the screen. Making PieChart for area manager that display total orders of all machines from a specific area (North, South, UAE). Making BarChart for CEO that display total orders of all areas. In addition, it finds and show: The best and worst area depends on sales. The best and worst machine depends on sales.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      arg0 - the location of the root object
      arg1 - the resources used to localize the root object
